channel.title: Did an experiment
channel.description:
Ok, for the past week (exactly) I have been hardcore autoing about 8-10 lvl 3's, 14-18 hours per day since last friday. At the end of each day, I would drop trade my earnings of iron for the day over to my mule, which was used on my normal IP, while Aryan was proxied. I checked my bots today (Friday, 7 days after the experiment started), and all were banned EXCEPT the mule, which interacted (drop traded) with EVERY bot, once, EVERYday. This means my mule interacted with my bots roughly 63 times this past week, and stayed safe of a ban.
This goes to say that proxying while drop trading IS effective, although it's not 100% sure you wont get caught.
and just FYI, I autoed 90k iron in the duration of this week.

item.title: Did an experiment
item.dc:creator: @Loz Loz
item.description:
@Loz wrote:

jag024:

Loz, do you still play RS or you just auto to see how it works and do expiriments?

i haven’t been on RS for a few months, and i was bored last week, so i checked to see if autoing was still going on, and it was, so i updated my old aryan, and started botting again. so i might use the money to start playing again, or i might just sell it for $, not really sure yet.

Read full topic

@Loz wrote:

[quote=“DeadBird, post:5, topic:2093”]I do this,though reversed,IP banning w\o autoing on your main is a false propaganda.
I don’t use my iron on main,I buy accounts with it :D.
Auto iron on my ip,trade on proxy.
(btw,wanna gimme your script?,lol mine aren’t that good if its ‘private’ pm it to me if you want’)[/quote]

I was just using rmineBank
